items.name: Bread Basket
items.description: Assortment of fresh baked fruit breads and muffins

items.name: Honey Almond Granola with Fruits
items.description: Natural cereal of honey toasted oats, raisins, almonds and dates

items.name: Belgian Waffle
items.description: Vanilla flavored batter with malted flour

items.name: Scrambled eggs
items.description: Scrambled eggs, roasted red pepper and garlic, with green onions

items.name: Blueberry Pancakes
items.description: With syrup, butter and lots of berries

items.name: Coq au Vin
items.description: Chicken braised with red wine, mushrooms, and bacon, served with pearl onions and carrots.

items.name: Quiche Lorraine
items.description: Savory tart filled with eggs, cream, bacon, and Gruyère cheese.

items.name: Croque Monsieur
items.description: Classic French ham and cheese sandwich topped with béchamel sauce and broiled to perfection.

items.name: Ratatouille
items.description: Provençal vegetable medley of eggplant, zucchini, bell peppers, and tomatoes, cooked in olive oil and herbs.

items.name: Bouillabaisse
items.description: Traditional fish stew from Marseille, made with a variety of fish, shellfish, tomatoes, and saffron.

items.name: Boeuf Bourguignon
items.description: Tender beef stewed in red wine with carrots, onions, and garlic, served with potatoes.

items.name: Duck Confit
items.description: Slow-cooked duck leg confit served with crispy skin, accompanied by roasted potatoes and green beans.

items.name: Duck à l'Orange
items.description: Crispy duck breast with a sweet and tangy orange sauce, served with roasted vegetables.

items.name: Beef Bourguignon
items.description: Rich and hearty beef stew braised in red wine with carrots, onions, and mushrooms, served with buttery mashed potatoes.

items.name: Le Pot-au-feu
items.description: Ox meat cooked in a broth flavored with vegetables and aromatic plants. An ancestral dish of rural and humble origin.

items.name: Crème Brûlée
items.description: A decadent vanilla custard topped with a layer of caramelized sugar, creating a delicate contrast of creamy sweetness and crunchy texture.

items.name: Tarte Tatin
items.description: An upside-down caramelized apple tart with a flaky pastry crust, served warm with a scoop of vanilla ice cream.

items.name: Éclair au Chocolat
items.description: A light and airy choux pastry filled with rich chocolate cream and topped with a smooth chocolate glaze.

items.name: Crêpe Suzette
items.description: Delicate crêpes served with a tangy and sweet orange sauce, flambéed with Grand Marnier for a spectacular presentation.

items.name: Profiteroles
items.description: Cream puffs filled with vanilla ice cream and drizzled with warm chocolate sauce, creating a delightful contrast of textures and temperatures.
